content: included in the group there can be up to six diagonals attached to a single mesh stitch diagonals are defined as follows dr crosses two grids to the right step 1 dr crosses one 2 grid to the right step 2 vr crosses one grid to the right and two grids down step 3 vl crosses one grid to the left and two grids down step 5 dl crosses one grid to the left step 6 and/or dl crosses two grids to the left step 7 2 odd number rs row even number ws row step 1 dr yo 3 times pulling st to rs front step 1 dr yo 3 times pulling st to ws back 2 2 insert hook 2 mesh stitches to the right of insert hook 2 mesh stitches to the right of where the working mesh st for the group where the working mesh st for the group will be made yo pull up lp yo pull thru will be made yo pull up lp yo pull thru 2 lps on hook 3 times 2 lps on hook 3 times step 2 dr yo twice pulling st to rs front step 2 dr yo twice pulling st to ws back insert hook 1 mesh stitch to the right of insert hook 1 mesh stitch to the right of where the working mesh st for the group where the working mesh st for the group will be made yo pull up lp yo pull thru will be made yo pull up lp yo pull thru 2 lps on hook twice 2 lps on hook twice step 3 vr yo 3 times pulling st to rs front step 3 vr yo 3 times pulling st to ws back insert hook 1 mesh stitch to the right and insert hook 1 mesh stitch to the right and 1 row down from where the working 1 row down from where the working mesh st for the group will be made yo mesh st for the group will be made yo pull up lp yo pull thru 2 lps on hook 3 pull up lp yo pull thru 2 lps on hook 3 times times step 4 f or b yo pulling st to f or b as step 4 f or b yo pulling st to f or b as indicated insert hook in next mesh st yo indicated insert hook in next mesh st yo pull up lp yo pull thru 2 lps on hook pull up lp yo pull thru 2 lps on hook step 5 vl yo 3 times pulling st to rs front step 5 vl yo 3 times pulling st to ws back insert hook 1 mesh stitch to the left and 1 insert hook 1 mesh stitch to the left and 1 row down from where the working mesh row down from where the working mesh st for the group was just made yo pull up st for the group was just made
